General.Name: SKRR Exploration Inc
General.Description: SKRR Exploration Inc. operates as a precious and base metal explorer in Canada. It explores for gold, zinc, copper, and nickel properties. The company holds a 100% interest in the Manson Bay South property comprising nine mineral claims totaling 4,293 hectares located in Saskatchewan; and the Carp River nickel-copper-cobalt project comprising of five contiguous mineral claims totaling 5,606.48 hectares located in Saskatchewan. It also has an option to acquire interests in Olson, Cathro, Ithingo, Irving, and Leland projects situated in Saskatchewan. In addition, the company holds a 100% interest in Father Lake nickel property located in Saskatchewan. The company was formerly known as Canex Energy Corp. and changed its name to SKRR Exploration Inc. in January 2020. SKRR Exploration Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 228-1122 Mainland Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6B 5L1
